ability.Ghost Armor: 30% chance to gain Ghost Armor on switch-in. Ghost Armor can also be triggered by a Physical hit. Ghost Armor increases Defense by 1.5x and lasts for 2 turns. During the period, it cannot be triggered repeatedly.
